titles.title: There is nothing greater than grace1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What do you say to someone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Who ffels like they've lost it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Over the hedge, with no one there to break their fall

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Who feels so unloved

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Giving themselve away

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: A little bit everday, just to be good enough

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: And what do you say to a hopeless soul

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Who can't remember their way home

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: And everything is outof their control

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: There is no valley, there is no darkness,

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: There is no sorrow greater than the grace of Jesus

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: There is no moment, there is no distance,

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: There is no heartbreak He can't take it through

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: So before you think that you're too lost to save

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Remember there is nothing greater than grace

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Whose life is on the line

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: And they're unsure what happens after their last breath in time

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: What do you say to someone who's

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Built a wall who can't break through

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: And it's so hard for them to hear the truth

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: Don't loose hope

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Don't let go

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: Don't give up

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: You are not alone, you are not alone, you are not alone
